mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(nnum, ntitle, ncontent, cnt, word, rdate, nimage, nimagesaved, nsize) VALUES(notice_seq.nextval, #{ntitle}, #{ncontent}, #{cnt}, #{word}, sysdate, #{nimage}, #{nimagesaved}, #{nsize});
mapper.select: SELECT nnum, ntitle, rdate, cnt, ADMINNO FROM notice ORDER BY nnum DESC
